name: ORD_AUD_DESIGNATED_OWNERS
description: This table contains the audit information about the designated owners who own this imaging study.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ASGN_OWNERS_EXTERNAL_VALUES
columns.description: Audit information about the designated owners (external value) who own this imaging study. The values are delimited by "^". The source item is located at ORDER_RAD_OWNERS.OWNER_PROV_ID. This column shows the translated external value as of when the column was last extracted.

columns.name: ASGN_OWNERS_SER_IDS
columns.description: Audit information about the designated owners (IDs) who own this imaging study.  The values are delimited by "^". The source item is located at ORDER_RAD_OWNERS.OWNER_PROV_ID.
